duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet and assist visitors, students, parents, teachers and board members.
Record information on Excel and Access spreadsheets regarding requests for information as well as student information.
Assist students with registering over the phone or via website.
Accept payments in QuickBooks, write receipts for cash payments.
Prepare confirmations and invoices for both new and returning students.
Perform the opening and/or end of day routine including locking windows, turning off lights, turning off computers and copier, arming/disarming the security system, etc.
Additional office tasks (e.g., copying, folding items, stuffing envelopes, filing, preparing attendance reports and more), as directed.
